name: Steel Dungeon 钢铁地牢
description:
Change your languages in the settings. Rougelike FPS . Now surports gamepad and keyboard&mouse.
Game Specialities1.30+ enemies，20+ weapons，20+ rooms.
2.Random room to make a dungeon world.
3.8 vehicles，9 Characters.
4.Unlockable contentAdaptiveAn adaptive game can with mouse or gamepad , and adjust the rotate mode of the camera.
